description: Try our easy to follow Ham with Spicy Bacon and Maple Glaze recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ham with Spicy Bacon and Maple Glaze
name: Ham with Spicy Bacon and Maple Glaze Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5 kg bone in full leg ham

recipeInstructions.text: Dissolve coffee in 3/4 cup boiling water. Add sugar, maple syrup and coffee and cook for 5 minutes. Pour in vinegar and simmer for 30 minutes or until mixture has reduced by half and becomes sticky. Cool to room temperature before using. Tips. Baked Ham. When removing the rind from the ham, take care to leave the layer of fat under the rind intact. Run your fingers under the rind to separate it gently from the fat. Wrapping the ham in bacon before glazing adds another dimension of delicious flavour. The bacon will shrink a little as it cooks, so allow for a generous overlap. Glaze Note. This glaze can be made the day before. Use 120ml of glaze for every 1.3kg of ham.
